name: CheadleEastbincollection
0:
”Alexa, open Cheadle bin day”
”Alexa, ask Cheadle bin day to find the green bin day”
”Alexa, ask Cheadle bin day to find the next bin day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheadle bin day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill is launched by saying 'Open Cheadle bin day'. There are no prerequisites. 
The skill is specifically aimed at users in Cheadle, Stockport, UK. It tells you the next bin days. 
You can ask for all the next bin days, ask for your next bin day, or ask for the date of a particular bin colour, e.g. green or blue. For example, you can say "Ask Cheadle bin day for the next blue bin day", or "Ask Cheadle bin day for the next bin day"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
